title: Differentiator: Patient Surveys and Scoring
content: A key feature / offering of the COA application will be that of gathering information that extends beyond that which is collected by existing EMR systems.  This includes the ability to dynamically create and distribute via the cloud a survey to collect information and to seamlessly connect respondent information to COAâ€™s patient centered data model.  This dynamic survey builder will allow for the incorporation of multiple surveying approaches such as those used by ICHOM, PROMs or other systems.
